body:
Comment 4 by **kenliz@cruzio.com**: 
I'm not linking with cgo. I had been importing unsafe, but just to print the size and
alignment of various data types. I dropped that code in the debug, single package
version.

I was thinking reintroducing unsafe to use to calculate a checksum across the func that
is producing the errors.

I'll try your ideas about export GOGC, first.
